column2: "Wondue
column3: hɔn a wɔhyehyɛ mbrakyew
column4: na akyerɛwfo a wɔkyerɛw dza ɔkyea;"

column2: "dɛ wɔredan ohianyi efi pɛrpɛryɛ ho
column3: na woeehwim me man abɔbɔfo hɔn ndzinoa
column5: na wɔdze ngyanka aayɛ hɔn afonam!"

column2: "Hom bɛyɛ dɛn wɔ ɔsera da no mu
column3: na ɔsɛɛ a ofi ekyirekyir reba no mu? Woana hɔ na hom boguan akɛgye mboa? Na henfa na hom bɛdan hom enyimnyam egya?"

column2: "Adaduafo ase nko ara na wɔbɔbɔ hɔn mu adze
column3: na wɔahwehwe atɔfo ase. Naaso iyi nyina mu n’ebufuw nntɔree
column4: na ne nsa da ho ara wɔ sor."

column2: "Asiria
column3: due

column2: "Mobɔsoma no ɔman a wonnyim Nyankopɔn mu
column3: m’ebufuw man no ho na mebɛhyɛ no mbra
column6: na onketsiatsia hɔn do dɛ abrɔn mu dɛtse."

column2: "Naaso ɔnndwen dɛm
column3: eso n’akoma nnsusu dɛm; dza ɔwɔ n’akoma mu nye dɛ ɔbɛsɛɛ
column4: na oetwitwa amanaman a wɔdɔɔ so egu."

column2: "Na ɔka dɛ
column3: Ana m’asafohen nnyɛ ahemfo bi a?"

column2: "Aso Kalno nntse dɛ Karkemis bi a? Na Hamat nntse dɛ Arpad? Aso Samaria nntse dɛ Damaskɔs bi a?"
"Dɛ mbrɛ me nsa aka abosom ahendzi no a hɔn ehonyi a woegu kyɛn Jerusalɛm na Samaria dze no;"
"aso nnyɛ dza medze ayɛ Samaria nye n’abosom no
column3: ara so na medze bɛyɛ Jerusalɛm nye n’abosom bi a?"

column2: "Dɛm ntsi ɔbɛba dɛ sɛ EWURADZE wie n’edwuma nyina yɛ wɔ bepɔw Zion nye Jerusalɛm do a
column3: mebɛtsea Asiriahen n’akomadzen no

column2: "Osiandɛ ɔaka dɛ
column3: Me nsamu ahoɔdzen na medze ayɛ na ɔnye me nyansaa so
column4: osiandɛ meyɛ ɔbadwembafo: na matwe aman no hɔn ahe no
column6: na mesun hɔn a wɔtsetse nhengua do egu dɛ ɔkakaben:"

column2: "na me nsa aka amanaman ahonya no dɛ berɛbuw; na dɛ mbrɛ wɔtase nkyirefuwa a wɔadan egya no
column3: dɛmara na matase asaase nyina: na obi nnyi hɔ a ɔbɔɔ atsaban mu

column2: "Aso ekuma bɛhyehyɛ noho wɔ nyia ɔdze twa adze no do? Anaa seradaa bɛhyehyɛ noho wɔ nyia ɔtwetwe no do? Dɛ gyama abaa bi him nyia ɔma do no do
column3: anaadɛ poma bɛma nyia ɔnnyɛ dua no no do."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi EWURADZE
column3: dɔm EWURADZE
column4: bɛma ɔfɔn aba n’abran do; na ɔasɔ n’enyimnyam ase ogya a ɔredzɛw."

column2: "Na Israel kan no bɛdan ogya
column3: na ne Krɔnkrɔnnyi no adan gyaframee: na ɔbɛhyew na ɔaamen no nsoɛ nye no nkɔkrɔw nyina da kor."

column2: "Ɔbɛma no kwaa nye no mfuwa enyimnyam asa
column3: ofitsi ɔkra do kesi nyimpadua do: na ɔayɛ dɛ aber a frankaakitsafo rotɔ bitsi."

column2: "No kwaa mu ndua nkaa no bosuar
column3: ma abofra mpo eetum akan."

column2: "Na ɔbɛba da no mu dɛ
column3: Israel nkaa no nye Jakob fi mu hɔn a woefi nsa no nnkɔtwer nyia ɔbobɔɔ hɔn no bio: na wɔbɔtwer EWURADZE

column2: "Nkaa no bɛsan aba
column3: Jakob nkaa no bɛba Onyame katakyi no nkyɛn."

column2: "Na kaansa wo man Israel tse dɛ mpoano anhwea mpo
column3: a
column4: nkaa ara na wɔbɛsan aba: wɔahyɛ ɔhyew a ɔbɛpram ndzeyɛtsenenee do."

column2: "Na ndzɛmba ewiei a wɔahyɛ na EWURADZE
column3: dɔm EWURADZE

column2: "Dɛm ntsi mbrɛ EWURADZE
column3: dɔm EWURADZE
column5: Ao me man a etse Zion
column6: mma nnsuro Asiria: kaansa abaa na ɔdze bɔhwe wo
column7: na ɔama no poma do wɔ wo do
column8: dɛ Egypt dze no mpo a."

column2: "Na aka kakrabaabi na ebufuhyew no abɔ adze
column3: na n’ebufuw adan ayɛ hɔn sɛɛe."

column2: "Na dɔm EWURADZE behim mpirebi wɔ no do
column3: dɛ Midian ekumii wɔ Oreb botan do no: na n’abaa bɛkyerɛ po no do
column4: ɔama do dɛ Egypt dze no."

column2: "Na ɔbɛba wɔ da no mu dɛ n’adzesoa beyi efi wo batsir do
column3: na kɔndua efi wo kɔn ho
column4: na kɔndua no asɛɛ wɔ seradze no ntsi."

column2: "Ɔaba Aiat
column3: oetwa mu wɔ Migron

column2: "wɔafa akoko ntamu; wɔakɔsoɛ Geba: Rama ho popo; Saul Gibea eguan."
"Galim babaa
column3: ma wo ndze do tsea mu! Laisa e

column2: "Madmena ayɛ oguamfo; Gebim atsefo aboa hɔn ano ruguan."
"Ndɛ da yi ara wobesianka Nob: ɔbɔwosow ne nsa atsen Zion babaa ne bepɔw no do
column3: Jerusalɛm koko no a."

column2: "Hwɛ
column3: EWURADZE
column5: dze hu bɛpempan ndubaa no: na ndupɔn atsentsen no wɔbɔtotow ato famu
column6: na dza wɔwowaree no abrɛ adze."

column2: "Na ɔdze dadze etwitwa kwaa mu adɔtɔ
column3: na Lebanon nam ɔkatakyi nsa do ahwe ase."
